title.newValue: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Investigations triggered by manual actions

description.newValue:
In order to provide the most accurate information in the Action center, we're making a change that creates an investigation when manual actions are taken by admins. As we converge to the security.microsoft.com portal, this will ensure that all actions are shown in the converged action center.Â This Roadmap Item has been updated to align with new and updated timeline.
GA date: April CY2022
